Posts.Content: Dec 23, 2010 04:08PM Kathy61 wrote: Just standing up to be counted as another woman who was left with permanent alopecia as my souvenir of my breast cancer experience.  My treatment was docetaxel (Taxotere) in 2006.  My hair is thin on the sides, and barely there on the top, and my brows and lashes are sparse.  I do believe, from what I am hearing, that most patients do grow their hair again after treatment.  But, I waited eagerly for my hair to regrow, and it did not.  I am sad. :(
Posts.Title: Did anyone had her hair back after taxotere??? melania janet11
